title: PLAYDATE

team.name: Yujie Hong
team.about: I worked on concept development, user interaction design and prototyping and Unity development.

content_html:
Inspiration

Ecology and human-computer interaction.

What it does

Users can interact with objects in the world (starting with a building), remove parts, and the parts touched will be transformed into its constituent elements. I.e. Log cabin -> Log -> Trees. The singular becomes the multiple.

How we built it

We modelled assets and environment in Rhino and interactions in Unity

Challenges we ran into

Designing for real-life and virtual fields in reciprocity was difficult, especially when interacting with a field of objects.

What's next for playdate

Build the re-composition interactions.
content_md:
## Inspiration


Ecology and human-computer interaction. 


## What it does


Users can interact with objects in the world (starting with a building), remove parts, and the parts touched will be transformed into its constituent elements. I.e. Log cabin -> Log -> Trees. The singular becomes the multiple. 


## How we built it


We modelled assets and environment in Rhino and interactions in Unity 


## Challenges we ran into


Designing for real-life and virtual fields in reciprocity was difficult, especially when interacting with a field of objects. 


## What's next for playdate


Build the re-composition interactions.
